name: DOTS (itch) (Shady Owl)
description:
DOTS is a minimalistic puzzle game about thinking ahead. The game is an expanded version of a Mini Jam 111: Colors2 submission.

--KEYBOARD CONTROLS--

Up: W or ↑

Down: S or ↓

Left: A or ←

Right: D or →

Confirm: Enter/Return

Exit Level/Menu: Escape

--CONTROLLER CONTROLS--

Up: L Stick Up

Down:  L Stick Down

Left:  L Stick Left

Right:  L Stick Right

Confirm: South Button

Exit Level/Menu: East Button
